content.p: The University annual financial statements and global reviews are available on the Publications pages. Global reviews and financial statements Information on Planning, Budgeting, Forecasting, Reporting, Year end processes, Business partnering and business cases, available on the staff intranet (internal access only). Planning and Reporting Workspace (staff log-in required) Information about University's communications, marketing, recruitment, arts, engagement and policy are available at the External Relations web pages. External Relations The Financial Management (Corporate Finance) team is responsible for the delivery of statutory financial information and management accounts. Financial Management (Corporate Finance) email list: Please see our contacts page
